title: can any one not log on to league right now?
body: is any one not being able to log on to leauge? it just keeps giving me the loggin erorr mesage and a page to go to with reasons why, but i was just on the servers disco every one now i cant log on

Hey Dawnshairsalon,

http://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/15090150
saisei	
saisei (Riot Games Player Support)
Dec 04 06:58

Hey Summoner,

I'm sorry to hear that you're unable to log in to your account. No worries, I'll try my best to help you solve this issue as soon as possible.

Before I can proceed, I need you to provide me a screenshot of the error so I can determine on what's causing the problem.

You can obtain a screenshot out-of-game through the following steps:

- Press Print Screen

- Open MS Paint

- Paste the screenshot onto MS Paint

- Save it as a .jpg or .png file.

Looking forward for your reply!

saisei 
Riot Games Player Support
Mid Laner

Me and a friend are having the same issue. I keep getting Connection Error.

The packet loss has nothing to do with the Riot servers.  That has to do with the route your taking to get to their servers.  There's a lot of info on boards and google about what the packet loss stuff is all about.  Bottom line, has nothing to do with Riot, and they can't do anything about it.

Hey guys,

Sorry for not posting in here earlier, 2am was a bit too early >.<  But I wanted to make sure that I posted in here as well regarding the Login Issues we've been facing today.  I recently made a new sticky post outlining what is going on and where you can the get the latest updates about this issue.  Check it out here:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/kajsGIQ6-why-cant-i-login-rito-pls
Submitted a ticket for the issue, and I was told that they are getting a high volume of requests atm. Gee, I wonder why?
I submitted one 4 hours ago, haven't gotten a reply besides that initial one.

all mine does is log on but loads at that screen then says connection failure.. all my stuff is fine but everything is up and running. my feeling is someone might be Ddosing the server or theres a bug in the system or im just to high..

Logged in about 6 hours ago, got disconnected at loading screen and havent been able to log in since.  Troubleshot with internet service provider and McAfee, not an internet connection issue or firewall issue.  Can connect to Oceania server but unable to connect to NA server.  Have an open ticket to support at the moment, no response as of yet.

Im having the same problem. I can login to EUW but not to NA. Also I tried from a different computer. It didnt work. So I'm pretty sure it's no firewall and no computer problem. Did anyone find a fix to this already?

they didn't sell as much {{champion:429}} as they though and are unable to pay the **Adobe Air** bill, see the thread below for more clues on what is causing this error by 2 years, a well known issue and they keep toying with us, making us send "proof", and asking us to disable our firewall, our ip helper (needed to surf the web) and out sisters too. Fun fact if you disable ip helper you will be unable to browse the web and therefore submit ticket requests, its much like if your ISP tells you that to fix your router you have to cut the ethernet cable. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/jb18v1LQ-connection-failure-unable-to-connect-to-the-pvpnet-server

Won't let me log in, keeps giving the connection error for some reason......

Whats going on over there? I remember a time when I had zero problems playing League of Legends. We have been plagued by connectivity issues and server stability issues for months. It seems to get better, then get worse again but I believe whole heatedly that Riot has stopped caring about its community when it comes to these issues. People have been complaining about constant disconnects, micro-stutter lag, connectivity issues, and other things over the past few months. I have experienced some, but not all of these problems. I have uninstalled, deleted, re installed the game. I constantly monitor my own internet connection to make sure its not on my end. I run diagnostics to see if my latency is spiking, and other troubleshooting steps to figure out of its on my end. I have even gone to the point of re-installing windows and proper driver updates. You can not put the blame on anyone anymore, I demand a public statement as to why, with all the millions of dollars this company is worth that you can not resolve simple issues like these. Lack of employees, lack of employee knowledge, hardware issues, connection provider issues, all of that can be dealt with over time. You have had MORE time than necessary during the obvious growing of these issues. I remember playing with 10+ friends, that I knew from outside of league of legends and NONE of them play anymore except me. On a larger scale, i'm pretty sure you will lose more of your player-base if this behavior is not resolved. You're breaking peoples hearts in the process, some people cant wait for a day off from work to play this game and then subjected to this type of nonsense.

People will say "1000 RP" like you have done in the past. You can have it, spend the money on fixing your internal company issues, and address the public by saying you are sorry.

Hi guys,

Riot have just updated that the issue should now be resolved: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na


> RiotMasterCheese – a few seconds ago
> We have performed some network configuration changes that appear to have resolved this issue. We will continue to monitor the situation to ensure that everything is working correctly.

> 44 minutes ago
> RiotMasterCheese — We're aware of problems related to logging into the NA platform and are working with our partner on getting these resolved. Earlier today we experienced issues with a major national backbone provider, causing many players to experience connection issues to our platform. We're also checking the health of our own infrastructure, but at this moment we believe the issue is related to the provider's infrastructure.


Looks like it should've been fixed as of a few seconds ago - might be worth trying to get your game on! :-)
I think it works now.
well guys they are saying they are working on it........now everyone on NA server is having login problems. Let's just hope they fix it fast.
